content: tie off weave in ends weave drawstring into r26 *drawstrings there are multiple options for drawstrings  crochet two chains of the desired length using same or complementary yarn  make kumihimo or finger-loop braids using the same or complementary yarn for an attractive smooth cord that s easier to open and close than crocheted cords  use shoelaces of matching or complementary color for another option that s easier to open and close than crocheted cords and super easy cut off the aglets tips and knot the ends after weaving through have fun © marsha glassner 2017 3
